channel.title: Ludwig Sound
channel.description: Where past and present meets in Sound!

item.title: Support production of Bomba Titinka's new album
item.description: Bomba Titinka have a stack of new material to record and press onto a longwaited vinyl. To claim that aim they'll we need your support. Take a vintage heart and have a look on their campaign.

item.title: Ludwig Sound on Womex
item.description: Beside we've finally finished our new website (Hooray!) we'd also like to tell you about our participation on WOMEX 2016 in Santiago di Compostella. <!--more--> Though we won't provide any stand this year, we are always around and flexible with appointments. So get in touch!
